text: Paola Sabbatini is an Italian water polo player and coach. She was a member of the Italian women's national water polo team. She played at the 1994 World Aquatics Championships and 2001 World Aquatics Championships. She was a member of the Italian team at the 2015 FINA World Masters Championship. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Italian water polo players Category:Italian water polo coaches
title: Paola Sabbatini
